item.title: Hello World
item.description: I used to blog a little bit on Blogger when I was in China. I have stopped blogging for a long time since the emergency of social networks. Looking back at what I wrote when I was a young college student, I couldnâ€™t help but feel how different I am right now. As a meteorological researcher working with numerical models and datasets, I am more of a data scientist. Programming wise, I have being on the traditional track: starting with the basis of C and Fortran, then the script visualization tool in Atmospheric Science GrADS for a while before transitioning to NCL.
